TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase

summary.span: 作為在網頁上裝載 控制項之網頁組件控制項集合中的主要控制項。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是複合控制項，以涵蓋在網頁上定義的區域，並包含伺服器控制項。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control that covers a defined region on a Web page and contains server controls. 區域的主要功能是配置的控制項，其中的內容，並提供這些控制項通用的使用者介面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 如需區域和 Web 組件的應用程式中的使用方式的一般資訊，請參閱基底的參考文件類別，和[Web 組件控制項設定概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). 控制項是其中一個基本的控制項，Web 組件控制項集合中。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. Web 組件的主要功能是使用者的修改 （或個人化） 網頁的能力根據他們的喜好設定，並將其個人化設定儲存為未來的瀏覽器工作階段。A key feature of Web Parts is the ability of end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 組件頁面的其中一個層面，包括編輯;使用者可以編輯的外觀、 配置、 行為以及其他屬性的可見控制項。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes editing; users can edit the appearance, layout, behavior, and other properties of the visible controls. Web 組件控制項集合中的數個控制項提供編輯功能，包括控制項。Several controls in the Web Parts control set provide the editing features, including the control. 控制項，便顯示 Web 組件頁面進入編輯模式，它可提供各種可以用來個人化的控制項控制項。An control becomes visible when a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and it makes available various controls that can be used to personalize controls. 控制項是非常類似於其父代，類別，其中一個主要差異：控制項提供區域範本，在參考其屬性。The control is very similar to its parent, the class, with one key difference: The control provides a zone template, referenced in its property. 區域範本加入宣告中的頁面保存格式內容的功能。The zone template adds the ability to declare content in the page persistence format. 網頁開發人員可以放置控制網頁、 宣告式標記中新增一個子系``項目，並在``項目，加入宣告式參考控制項。Page developers can place an control in the declarative markup of a Web page, add a child `` element, and within the `` element, add declarative references to controls. 控制項還多了一種方法， ，因而覆寫中的基底方法類別。The control also has a method, , which overrides a base method in the class. 這個方法是必要的讓控制項可以建立區域範本，無法包含任何以宣告方式新增至區域的控制項。This method is necessary so that an control can create the zone template to contain any controls that are added to the zone declaratively. > [!NOTE] > 中的按鈕UI 需要用戶端指令碼，才能順利運作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果瀏覽器中，停用指令碼，使用者將無法執行動作，透過UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 此範例會建立自訂編輯器區域繼承自類別，並使用 Web 組件頁面中。The example creates a custom editor zone that inherits from the class, and uses it in a Web Parts page. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更在網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 參考自訂的 Web 網頁控制項。A Web page that references the custom control. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需更多詳細此控制項中顯示模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is a Web page. 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`使用者控制項的指示詞。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 使用者控制項的標記宣告中的頁面`uc1:`項目的前置詞。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `uc1:` prefix for the element. 請注意以下``項目是``包含數個項目控制項，以某些標記和屬性來判斷其外觀和行為設定。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains several controls, with some tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 也有一些方法，可存取的不同成員以程式設計方式控制。There are also a number of methods that access various members of the control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單中，以切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要顯示的編輯 UI，您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**，編輯控制項。To display the editing UI, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 使用可見的編輯 UI，您可以看見的宣告式和以程式設計方式使用的效果類別成員。With the editing UI visible, you can see the effects of the declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果您想要建立自訂區域以獲得更好的控制，透過編輯 UI 的轉譯，您可以直接繼承自類別，只要您不需要提供新增的網頁開發人員的區域範本支援以宣告方式控制項以您的區域。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone to gain greater control over the rendering of the editing UI, you can inherit directly from the class, as long as you do not need to provide zone template support for page developers to add controls to your zone declaratively.

para.span: 在此情況下，您會將所有以程式設計方式控制至區域。

span.span: In such a case, you would add all controls to a zone programmatically.

para.span: 如果您想要支援區域範本，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you want to provide zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 以頁面保存格式，建立在區域樣板中宣告的所有 控制項。

span.span: Creates all the controls declared within a zone template in page persistence format.

returns.span: ，包含在區域樣板中宣告之所有 控制項的參考。

span.span: An that contains references to all the controls declared within the zone template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底的方法，以建立只宣告區域範本內的控制項。The method overrides the base method to create only the controls that are declared within the zone template. 任何其他必須以程式設計方式加入控制項新增至區域。Any other controls added to the zone must be added programmatically. 作法是，比方說，藉由實作介面中控制項。This can be done, for example, by implementing the interface in a control. 然後，在覆寫方法，您可以加入自訂的集合區域的控制項。Then, in the overridden method, you can add a collection of custom controls to a zone.

exception.span: 目前的 控制項並沒有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 提供樣板，以頁面保存格式將子控制項包含在 控制項之中。

span.span: Provides a template to contain child controls within an control in page persistence format.

value.span: 區域樣板，做為區域中子控制項的容器。

span.span: An zone template that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是之間的主要差異類別和基底類別。The property is the key difference between the class and the base class. 藉由新增區域範本時，支援類別可讓網頁開發人員来放置子內控制宣告式 Web 網頁標記中的控制項。By adding support for a zone template, the class enables page developers to place child controls within an control in the declarative markup of a Web page. 區域範本做為子控制項的容器。The zone template acts as a container for the child controls. > [!NOTE] > Set 存取子屬性呼叫方法，這會強制集合重新建立範本中所宣告的控制項。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls declared in the template to be recreated. 這樣會導致能夠辨識範本內容的任何變更。This causes any changes in the contents of the template to be recognized. 若要以宣告方式在使用區域範本控制項，加入一組``標籤和參考控制項的標記之間。To use a zone template declaratively within an control, you add a pair of `` tags, and reference controls between the tags. 只有一個區域範本會轉譯每個執行個體控制項 (因此，沒有理由来加入多個``項目控制項)。Only one zone template is rendered per instance of an control (therefore, there is no reason to add multiple `` elements to an control). 此外，區域的範本控制項可以包含衍生自組件控制項類別。Also, the zone template of an control can contain only part controls that derive from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative use of the property. 此範例的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The full code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以置於``中的項目控制項。The code example demonstrates how controls can be placed within a `` element in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**下拉式清單中，以切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要顯示編輯的使用者介面 (UI)，您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**，編輯控制項。To display the editing user interface (UI), you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 使用可見的編輯 UI 中，您就可以看見數個控制項中已宣告``項目。With the editing UI visible, you can see the several controls that are declared within the `` element.
